mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysFileUpload Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FILE_UPLOAD_DATE , FILE_UPLOAD_TURN , FILE_UPLOAD_SECT_CD , FILE_UPLOAD_TP_CD , FILE_NM , PROGRS_STAT_CD , FAILR_RESN_CONT , FILE_UPLOAD_CNT , MOD_BF_CNT , MOD_AF_CNT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_FILE_UPLOAD WHERE 1 = 1 AND FILE_UPLOAD_DATE = #{fileUploadDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND FILE_UPLOAD_TURN = #{fileUploadTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
